snippet: The Justice Department ordered the city to create its first civilian board for overseeing police conduct in 2014 after finding systemic misconduct and insufficient oversight in the Police Department.
abstract: Newark City Council gives initial approval for plan to create first civilian review board to assess conduct of city's police force; move follows federal investigation finding system misconduct in Newark Police Dept.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department ordered the city to create its first civilian board for overseeing police conduct in 2014 after finding systemic misconduct and insufficient oversight in the Police Department.

headline.main: Newark City Council Acts on Plan for Police Review Panel
